product_name: KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker with Dancing Fountain Light Show Sound for PC, MP3 Player, Laptops, Smartphone Black
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each phase. The product weighs 1.11 pounds (0.5 kg). The breakdown is as follows: 1) Raw material extraction and processing: Plastic (ABS) contributes ~2.5 kg CO2e/kg, Metal (steel/aluminum) ~8 kg CO2e/kg, Rubber ~3 kg CO2e/kg, Glass ~1.2 kg CO2e/kg, and Electronics (PCB) ~10 kg CO2e/kg. Weighted by their percentages, this totals ~3.8 kg CO2e. 2) Transportation: Assuming 500 km by truck (0.1 kg CO2e/kg) adds ~0.05 kg CO2e. 3) Manufacturing and assembly: Energy-intensive processes (injection molding, PCB assembly) add ~1.35 kg CO2e. The sum of these phases results in ~5.2 kg CO2e for the product leaving the factory gate.

product_name: Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition 2048 MB GDDR5 PCI-Express Video Card 5870PE52G
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 graphics card were estimated based on the provided material composition and standard emission factors for each material and manufacturing phase. The calculation includes: 1) Raw material extraction and processing (Plastic: 3.0 kg CO2e/kg, Aluminum: 8.0 kg CO2e/kg, Copper: 4.0 kg CO2e/kg, Silicon: 5.0 kg CO2e/kg, Gold: 12.0 kg CO2e/kg, Steel: 2.0 kg CO2e/kg, Other metals: 6.0 kg CO2e/kg, Fiberglass: 3.5 kg CO2e/kg), weighted by their percentage contribution to the product's weight (2.16 lbs â‰ˆ 0.98 kg). 2) Transportation emissions were estimated at 0.1 kg CO2e per kg of product for average distances. 3) Manufacturing and assembly emissions were estimated at 15 kg CO2e per kg of product, considering the energy-intensive processes involved in semiconductor and electronics manufacturing. The total emissions are dominated by the manufacturing phase (14.7 kg CO2e), followed by raw material extraction (29.5 kg CO2e) and transportation (0.1 kg CO2e).

product_name: Case for iPad Pro 12.9 2022/2021/2020/2018, Blue Flowers Shockproof Protective Case for iPad Pro 12.9 6th/5th/4th/3rd Gen, [Auto Sleep/Wake] [with Pencil Holder] Adjustable Stand iPad Case Folio Cover
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the iPad Pro case were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each material phase. The breakdown is as follows: 1) Raw material extraction and processing: PU Leather (50%) contributes ~1.2 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~2.4 kg CO2e/kg), TPU (30%) contributes ~0.9 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~3.0 kg CO2e/kg), Microfiber (15%) contributes ~0.3 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~2.0 kg CO2e/kg), and other materials (5%) contribute ~0.1 kg CO2e. 2) Transportation of raw materials: Assumed minimal (~0.1 kg CO2e) due to lightweight materials and short supply chains typical for such products. 3) Manufacturing and assembly: Estimated ~0.2 kg CO2e for injection molding (TPU), cutting/sewing (PU Leather), and printing/assembly processes. The total weight of the case is approximately 0.54 kg (1.19 lbs), and the emissions are scaled accordingly. The calculation excludes distribution, use phase, and end-of-life emissions as per the specified boundary.

product_name: Lenovo Thinkpad T440S 14" FHD Touchscreen Ultrabook Laptop Computer, Intel Core i5-4200U up to 2.6GHz, 8GB RAM, 240GB SSD, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB 3.0, Windows 10 Professional (Renewed)
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the Lenovo Thinkpad T440S laptop are estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each material and manufacturing phase. The calculation includes: 1) Raw material extraction and processing (e.g., aluminum, plastics, glass, steel, copper, silicon, lithium), 2) Transportation of raw materials to the manufacturing facility (assuming average distances and standard logistics emissions), and 3) Manufacturing and assembly processes (e.g., PCB fabrication, component assembly, touchscreen integration). The largest contributors are aluminum (high energy intensity) and plastics (fossil-based), followed by electronics (PCB, semiconductors) and battery production. The total weight of the laptop (1.58 kg) and material percentages were used to scale emissions. The estimate aligns with industry averages for similar laptops in cradle-to-gate assessments.

product_name: Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties Cable Straps for Home Office Tablet PC TV Electronics Wires Organizer Management (15 Pack 8 inch + 15 Pack 12 inch)
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each phase. The product consists of 80% fabric (hook and loop fastening), 15% plastic (reinforcement/backing), and 5% adhesive (closure/coating). Emission factors used: Fabric (2.5 kg CO2e/kg), Plastic (3.5 kg CO2e/kg), Adhesive (4.0 kg CO2e/kg). The total weight of the product is 3.2 ounces (0.09 kg). Raw material extraction and processing contributed ~0.3 kg CO2e (fabric: 0.072 kg, plastic: 0.047 kg, adhesive: 0.018 kg). Transportation emissions were estimated at ~0.05 kg CO2e (assuming 500 km by truck at 0.1 kg CO2e/ton-km). Manufacturing and assembly added ~0.1 kg CO2e (energy-intensive processes for hook-and-loop fastening and adhesive application). The total cradle-to-gate emissions sum to 0.45 kg CO2e.

product_name: HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece with One Pair Medium Earmolds for Speaker Mics
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions were estimated based on the material composition (60% rubber, 30% plastic, 10% metal) and standard emission factors for these materials. Rubber production emits approximately 0.5 kg CO2e/kg, plastic (assumed to be PVC) emits about 2.5 kg CO2e/kg, and metal (assumed to be aluminum) emits around 8 kg CO2e/kg. The product's weight is 0.04 lbs (0.018 kg), leading to material-specific emissions: rubber (0.018 kg * 60% * 0.5 kg CO2e/kg = 0.0054 kg CO2e), plastic (0.018 kg * 30% * 2.5 kg CO2e/kg = 0.0135 kg CO2e), and metal (0.018 kg * 10% * 8 kg CO2e/kg = 0.0144 kg CO2e). Transportation emissions were estimated assuming 100 km by truck (0.1 kg CO2e/kg of product). Manufacturing emissions were approximated as 20% of material emissions (0.0333 kg * 20% = 0.0067 kg CO2e). Total cradle-to-gate emissions sum to approximately 0.45 kg CO2e.

product_name: ASUS VivoBook Thin and Light Laptop, 15.6" HD Display, Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor, USB Type-C, Webcam, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Windows 11 Home, Gray (12GB RAM | 256GB SSD)
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the ASUS VivoBook laptop are estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each material and manufacturing process. The breakdown is as follows: 1) Raw material extraction and processing: Aluminum (30%) contributes ~75 kg CO2e, Plastic (25%) ~50 kg CO2e, Glass (10%) ~20 kg CO2e, Copper (8%) ~20 kg CO2e, Steel (7%) ~15 kg CO2e, Silicon (5%) ~10 kg CO2e, Lithium (5%) ~10 kg CO2e, Other Metals (4%) ~8 kg CO2e, Rubber/Elastomers (3%) ~6 kg CO2e, Ceramics (2%) ~4 kg CO2e, Other Plastics (1%) ~2 kg CO2e. 2) Transportation of raw materials: Estimated at ~10 kg CO2e. 3) Manufacturing and assembly: Estimated at ~30 kg CO2e, including energy use for PCB fabrication, component assembly, and final product assembly. The total is rounded to 250 kg CO2e, considering the laptop's weight (3.97 lbs) and typical emissions for similar devices.

product_name: SMDV Diffuser-50 -- Professional 20x20" Rigid Softbox for Canon Flash
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each phase. The product weighs 2.65 pounds (1.2 kg). The breakdown is as follows: 1) Raw material extraction and processing: rip stop nylon (50%) has an emission factor of ~5 kg CO2e/kg, fiberglass (30%) ~2 kg CO2e/kg, metal (15%) ~8 kg CO2e/kg, and silver coating (5%) ~20 kg CO2e/kg. Weighted average emissions for materials: ~5.35 kg CO2e/kg. 2) Transportation: assuming 500 km by truck (0.1 kg CO2e/kg). 3) Manufacturing and assembly: estimated at 0.5 kg CO2e/kg for textile and light assembly processes. Total emissions: (1.2 kg * 5.35) + (1.2 kg * 0.1) + (1.2 kg * 0.5) = 3.45 kg CO2e.

product_name: RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit with 32GB Micro SD Card, Power Supply with ON/Off, Case, Micro SDHC Card, Cooling Fan, HDMI Cable, Network Cable, Hestsinks, Card Reader, Screwdriver
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each material phase. The breakdown is as follows: 1) Raw material extraction and processing: Plastic (40%) contributes ~4 kg CO2e, Metal (25%) ~3.75 kg CO2e, Silicon (15%) ~1.5 kg CO2e, Glass (5%) ~0.5 kg CO2e, Rubber (5%) ~0.5 kg CO2e, PCB (5%) ~0.75 kg CO2e, and Other (5%) ~0.5 kg CO2e. 2) Transportation of raw materials: Estimated at ~0.5 kg CO2e assuming average distances. 3) Manufacturing and assembly: Estimated at ~0.5 kg CO2e for PCB assembly, plastic molding, and metalworking. The total is rounded to 12.5 kg CO2e, with the largest contributions from plastic and metal production.

product_name: USB 3.0 Extension Cable 20Ft, TanGuYu USB 3.0 Extender Cord Type A Male to A Female for Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive,Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera
explanation: The cradle-to-gate CO2e emissions for the USB 3.0 extension cable were estimated based on the material composition and standard emission factors for each material and manufacturing process. The breakdown is as follows: 1) PVC (50% of weight): ~0.5 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~2 kg CO2e/kg PVC for extraction and processing); 2) Copper (30% of weight): ~0.3 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~4 kg CO2e/kg copper for mining, refining, and processing); 3) Gold (5% of weight): ~0.2 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~15 kg CO2e/kg gold for mining and refining); 4) Tin (5% of weight): ~0.1 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~8 kg CO2e/kg tin for mining and processing); 5) Aluminum foil (5% of weight): ~0.05 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~4 kg CO2e/kg aluminum for production); 6) Polyester braid (5% of weight): ~0.05 kg CO2e (emission factor: ~3 kg CO2e/kg polyester for production). Transportation emissions were estimated at ~0.1 kg CO2e (assuming 500 km by truck). Manufacturing and assembly (including cable extrusion, shielding, and connector assembly) contributed ~0.1 kg CO2e. The total was rounded to 1.2 kg CO2e, with PVC and copper being the largest contributors due to their high weight percentages and emission factors.
